item.description:
Howdy!

Yes, I've been sitting in a chair for far too long. I'm out of shape and looking for a jump start back into shape.
So I figured I'd schedule a little hike to Mt Wachusett.

Here's info and directions: http://www.mass.gov/d...
Due to the distance, carpooling is recommended.

Well, as promised I'm changing the meeting location slightly. I dug around a bit and found a nice loop.
The loop described is 5.8 miles. It's a good slice of the area. We'll wing it as we go and shorten it up if need be depending upon timing and legs. The new meeting location is the ski resort parking lot, 499 Mountain Road Princeton MA.

Here's a link: http://maps.google.co...

Lunch is TBD.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my cell # to the 'yes' list
item.why: Let's stop kidding ourselves. You know you want to.
item.name: Mt Wachusett Hike
